cc_emails.description: Email addresses that are cc'd on the ticket

fwd_emails.description: Email addresses to which the ticket has been forwarded

reply_cc_emails.description: Email addresses that are cc'd on ticket replies

ticket_cc_emails.description: Email addresses that are cc'd on all ticket communications

fr_escalated.description: Flag indicating if the ticket has been escalated for the first response

spam.description: Flag indicating if the ticket is marked as spam

email_config_id.description: The ID of the email configuration associated with the ticket

group_id.description: The ID of the group handling the ticket

priority.description: The priority level of the ticket

requester_id.description: The ID of the user who requested the ticket

responder_id.description: The ID of the user responding to the ticket

source.description: The source of the ticket creation

company_id.description: The ID of the company associated with the ticket

status.description: The current status of the ticket

subject.description: The subject or title of the ticket

association_type.description: The type of association of the ticket

to_emails.description: Email addresses to which the ticket is addressed

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with the ticket

id.description: The unique identifier of the ticket

type.description: The type or category of the ticket

due_by.description: The due date for the ticket

fr_due_by.description: The first response due date for the ticket

is_escalated.description: Flag indicating if the ticket has been escalated

custom_fields.description: Custom fields related to the ticket

created_at.description: The date and time when the ticket was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the ticket was last updated

associated_tickets_count.description: The number of tickets associated with this ticket

nr_due_by.description: The next response due date for the ticket

nr_escalated.description: Flag indicating if the ticket has been escalated for the next response

description.description: The detailed description of the ticket

description_text.description: The text version of the ticket description

requester.description: Details of the user who requested the ticket
